translations: 书信；使徒书；书信体诗文

sentences.sentence: "Had the Greeks held novelty in such disdain as we," asked Horace in his epistle, "what work of ancient date would now exist?"
sentences.translation: 霍勒斯在他的书信中问道：“如果希腊人也像我们这样鄙视新奇事物，那么古代的作品现在还会存在吗？”

sentences.sentence: I Tertius, who wrote this epistle, salute you in the Lord.
sentences.translation: 我这代笔写信的德丢，在主里面问你们安。

sentences.sentence: Ye are our epistle written in our hearts, known and read of all men.
sentences.translation: 你们就是我们的荐信，写在我们心里，被众人所知道所念诵的。
